description:
Glen has added an additional room for the convenience of having 2 guest. This cozy room has a queen size bed and a 40" smart tv.

The space
Comfortable and bright with queen size bed, 40inch smart TV, and Wifi

Guest access
Guest has access to livingroom, and 1 shared bathroom.

Other things to note
We are constantly upgrading for the convenience of our guest. We will be allowing our guest access to the back yard space and porch when we are able to complete other upgrades & repairs as the weather permits.
